attributes.action: make all convicted Paedophiles move to an area away from a childrens enviroment such as schools and parks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Convicted paedophile lives across the road from a Primary School! Litrally - he only has to look out of his window to watch the children!
If his house was a council or rented he would be made to move.. as he owns his house, there is no law to say he has to move! He should NOT be allowed to live near a school full stop!!
I would like to start this petition to make it a Priority to protect our children and make sure no paedophile is allowed to live within 5 miles from a school or park!
